}} 'Development' is a peer-reviewed scientific journal in the field of
developmental biology that covers cellular and molecular mechanisms of animal
and plant development. Topics covered include stem cells and nuclear
reprogramming, regional specification, morphogenesis, organogenesis, evolution
of the developmental process, and developmental studies of disease.

In 2009, the BioMedical & Life Sciences Division of the Special Libraries
Association included Development in their list of top 100 journals in Biology
and Medicine over the last 100 years. [http://units.sla.org/division/dbio/p-
ublications/resources/dbio100.html Top 100 Journals in Biology and Medicine]
(accessed 10 February 2011) It is published by The Company of Biologists.
